title: Where's the Lie?
itunes:title: Where's the Lie?
description:
Boris Johnson could face losing his seat in parliament if he's found to have lied to MPs about parties during the pandemic. As the inquiry hots up, we talk to Peter Oborne, the author of 'The Assault on Truth: Boris Johnson, Donald Trump and the Emergence of a New Moral Barbarism'. Plus Yuan Potts and Caroline Hepker talk to IFS Senior Research Economist Ben Zaranko about the fiscal policies of Johnson's successors Liz Truss and Rishi Sunak. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:author: Bloomberg
